title: Urban Aesthetics & Creative Rebirth
subTitle: 城市美學與文創再生：屏東市一日遊
intro: For travelers who love photography, history, and a relaxed pace. Explore the 'renaissance' of Pingtung City, visiting the top-rated spots of 2025: the Victory Star Village and Heito 1909.
transportation: Take the train to **Pingtung Station (屏東火車站)**, then rent a P-Bike (public bicycle) or take a short taxi ride.

spots.name: Pingtung Public Library (屏東縣立圖書館總館)
spots.author: 阿文
spots.description: Known as the 'Library in the Forest', this 30-year-old cultural center was transformed into a glass-walled marvel surrounded by a 5-hectare camphor tree forest.
spots.tips: The best photo spot is the glass corridor on the 1st floor. Closed on Mondays.

spots.name: Victory Star Village (勝利星村創意生活園區)
spots.description: Historically known as the 'General's Village', this is the largest preserved cluster of Japanese-style military dormitories in Taiwan.
spots.tips: Restaurants here are very popular on weekends, reservation is highly recommended.

spots.name: Heito 1909 (屏東縣民公園)
spots.description: 'Heito' is the old Japanese name for Pingtung. This site was once a restricted paper pulp factory hidden underground for decades.
spots.tips: Visit around 4:30 PM to catch the sunset light on the rusty structures.

title: Tribes Above the Clouds: Shenshan Line
subTitle: 雲端上的部落：神山線深度一日遊
intro: Designed for travelers seeking 'cultural authenticity'. This tour takes you deep into the mountains to experience the Rukai and Paiwan tribes.
transportation: Take the **Taiwan Trip Bus 508 (Shenshan Line)** from **Pingtung Transfer Station (屏東轉運站)**.

spots.name: Guchuan Bridge (谷川大橋)
spots.author: Peellden
spots.description: Standing 99 meters tall (about 33 stories), this is the highest bridge in Taiwan.
spots.tips: The bus will slow down here, get your camera ready!

spots.name: Wutai Tribe (霧台部落)
spots.author: Sin-siōng
spots.description: A Rukai settlement famous for its 'breathing' slate houses built from local black shale.
spots.tips: Try the 'Millet Donuts' (小米甜甜圈) near the church.

spots.name: Rinari Tribe (禮納里部落)
spots.description: Known as the 'Provence of Taiwan', this village features European-style wooden cottages with traditional totem decorations.
spots.tips: Please respect residents' privacy when taking photos of houses.

title: Faith & Flavors: Peninsula Gateway
subTitle: 信仰與海味：半島入口美食巡禮
intro: A perfect route for families and food lovers, visiting the top-ranking 'Faith Economy' center and enjoying the best seafood in Pingtung.
transportation: Take **Taiwan Trip Bus 9189 (Kenting Express)** from Pingtung Station.

spots.name: Dapeng Bay (大鵬灣遊憩區)
spots.address: No. 631, Dapeng Bay Ring Rd., Donggang
spots.description: Once a Japanese seaplane base during WWII, it is now Taiwan's largest lagoon.
spots.tips: Rent a bike to cycle around the lagoon path.

spots.name: Donggang Seafood Market (華僑市場)
spots.author: Aa7778273
spots.description: Famous for Bluefin Tuna (May-July), known as the 'Porsche of the Sea'.
spots.tips: Buy fresh sashimi here for the best price in Taiwan.

spots.name: Checheng Fu'an Temple (車城福安宮)
spots.author: Taiwan Presidential Office
spots.description: The largest Land God temple in Southeast Asia, featuring a unique 'money-counting' furnace.
spots.tips: Buy the famous 'Salted Duck Eggs' and 'Preserved Onions' sold nearby.

title: Ecological Serenity: Escaping Crowds
subTitle: 國境之南的生態與靜謐
intro: Designed to avoid the commercialized areas, focusing on raw nature, marine education, and quiet coastlines.
transportation: Take **Bus 9189 (Kenting Express)** to Hengchun, then use the **Kenting Shuttle**.

spots.name: Wanlitong (萬里桐)
spots.author: CHO YEN CHIA
spots.description: A quiet fishing village and a top snorkeling spot with rich coral reefs.
spots.tips: Best place for snorkeling beginners due to calm waters.

spots.name: Longpan Park (龍磐公園)
spots.author: WEI, WAN-CHEN（魏琬臻）
spots.description: A vast limestone tableland offering unobstructed views of the Pacific Ocean.
spots.tips: Extremely windy! Hold onto your hats and sunglasses.

spots.name: Eluanbi Lighthouse (鵝鑾鼻燈塔)
spots.author: Tslai
spots.description: Known as the 'Light of East Asia', the only armed lighthouse in the world.
spots.tips: Great for a relaxing walk on the large grassy area.

title: Time Tunnel: From Military Villages to Hakka Culture
subTitle: 從眷村到客家文化：屏東全域透視 (Day 1)
intro: Part 1 of a comprehensive journey covering the cultural renaissance in northern Pingtung.
transportation: Car rental is recommended for this 3-day itinerary.

spots.name: Heito 1909 (屏東縣民公園)
spots.description: Witness the transformation of a sugar factory ruin into a modern design masterpiece.
spots.tips: There is a shallow water area where children can play.

spots.name: Liudui Hakka Cultural Park (六堆客家文化園區)
spots.description: Showcases umbrella-shaped solar structures and traditional paper umbrella crafts.
spots.tips: Try the Hakka Lei-Cha (Pounded Tea) DIY activity.

title: Railways, Ocean & Secret Sands
subTitle: 鐵道、海洋與秘境沙灘 (Day 2 & 3)
intro: Continuing south to explore railway history and a world-class aquarium sleepover.
transportation: Drive south via Provincial Highway 1 and 26.

spots.name: Chaozhou Railway Park (潮州鐵道園區)
spots.author: Tze Chiang Hao
spots.description: The only railway maintenance depot in Taiwan open to tourists.
spots.tips: Good for train enthusiasts.

spots.name: Overnight at NMMBA (夜宿海生館)
spots.author: Solomon203
spots.description: A bucket-list experience where you sleep in the underwater tunnel.
spots.tips: Must book months in advance!

spots.name: Fengchuisha (風吹砂)
spots.author: WEI, WAN-CHEN（魏琬臻）
spots.description: Unique sand dunes formed by strong winds blowing sand up the cliffs.
spots.tips: Best viewed in winter to see the sandstorm effect.

title: Offshore Island: Xiao Liuqiu
subTitle: 小琉球：與海龜共游的珊瑚之島
intro: A coral island just a short ferry ride away. Famous for having one of the highest densities of sea turtles in the world.

spots.name: Vase Rock (花瓶岩)
spots.author: Koika
spots.description: The landmark of Xiao Liuqiu. A perfect spot for snorkeling to see green sea turtles up close.
spots.tips: Do not touch the sea turtles; heavy fines apply!

spots.name: Black Dwarf Cave (烏鬼洞)
spots.author: Outlookxp
spots.description: A limestone cave maze formed by coral reefs. Offers stunning ocean views.
spots.tips: Bring a flashlight if you want to explore deeper caves.

spots.name: Intertidal Zone (潮間帶生態導覽)
spots.author: 劉恩慈
spots.description: Join a guided tour during low tide to see sea urchins and starfish.
spots.tips: Must wear provided water shoes to protect the coral.
